description: before E.A.P. Films and Theaters (Pvt)Ltd Vs. Hon. Mahinda Yapa Abeygunewardane & others-Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J-When the regulations made originally are rescinded, the regulations made under the said rescinded regulations also become revoked
